scripts.build: npm run build -w lib && npm run copy-dist && npm run build -w docs
scripts.copy-dist: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const src='./packages/lib/dist'; const dest='./packages/docs/lighthouse/dist'; if (!fs.existsSync(src)) { console.log('Skipping copy-dist: lib/dist not found'); process.exit(0); } fs.cpSync(src, dest, { recursive: true, force: true });"
